sentences.en: 8,000 homes were plunged into darkness as electricity cables crashed down.
sentences.cn: 由于电缆损毁，8,000户家庭顿时落入一片黑暗之中。

sentences.en: Computers account for 5% of the country'scommercial electricity consumption.
sentences.cn: 计算机占去该国商业用电的5%。

sentences.en: Electricity lines to 30,000 homes were gradually being restored yesterday.
sentences.cn: 昨天，3万户家庭逐渐恢复了供电。

sentences.en: Further information is available from your local electricity showroom.
sentences.cn: 想要获得更多信息可以咨询当地的电器展销厅。

sentences.en: He is using your mains electricity to recharge his car battery.
sentences.cn: 他在用你家里的电源给他的车载蓄电池充电。

sentences.en: High electricity bills point to a poor heating system or bad insulation.
sentences.cn: 高额电费开支说明供暖系统不足或建筑隔热材料不良。

sentences.en: It will produce electricity more cheaply than a nuclear plant.
sentences.cn: 它的发电成本要比核电站低。

sentences.en: Sara also pays a share of the gas, electricity and phone bills.
sentences.cn: 萨拉也分摊燃气费、电费和电话费。

sentences.en: The building had been trashed and its electricity supply cut.
sentences.cn: 那栋楼遭到打砸，电被切断。

sentences.en: The cost of electricity from coal-fired stations is expected to fall.
sentences.cn: 用煤作燃料的火力发电站的成本有望降低。

sentences.en: The deal marks a turnaround in the fortunes of South Wales Electricity.
sentences.cn: 这一协议标志着南威尔士电力公司时来运转。

sentences.en: The dynamo conked out so we've got no electricity.
sentences.cn: 发电机出了故障，所以停电了。

sentences.en: The farm was very isolated, but it had electricity.
sentences.cn: 那个农场非常偏远，但有电力供应。

sentences.en: The plant provides forty per cent of the country's electricity.
sentences.cn: 全国总电量的40%是这家发电厂提供的。

sentences.en: The rebels have cut off electricity from the capital.
sentences.cn: 叛军已经切断了来自首都的供电。

sentences.en: The region is valued for its coal and vast electricity-generating capacity.
sentences.cn: 这个地区因其煤炭资源丰富和发电能力巨大而备受重视。
